reviewText: just finished watching Aventurera, great movie,great story,the charisma of Ninon Sevilla really comes thru.....a real classic from the Golden Age of Mexican Cinema......didn"t know much about Ninon, but she is right up there with Maria Felix,Dolores Del Rio,Lola Beltran.....give this a thumbs up!!!.
Wonderful movies from the Mexican Golden Age!
Again, I say that someone in the industry should take these movie transfers seriously. The movies must be restored.

I enjoyed this DVD so much.  Ninon Sevilla is the best rhumba dancer of all times. She felt the rhythm and danced so gracefully. This is a vintage movie, of course. But, I find incredible that in the 1940s and early 1950s, movies were being made in Mexico to fit to the dancing of Ninon Sevilla. I understand this genre is now being called the Tropical Queens. Way to go, Ninon!
